welcome_message_body: Welcome to Villanueva, Honduras! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city known for its delicious cuisine, friendly locals, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Villanueva has to offer!

restaurants.name: queso José Mendoza
restaurants.description: queso José Mendoza is a deli located in Villanueva.

restaurants.name: Pikoriko
restaurants.description: Pikoriko is a fried chicken joint located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ramon Villeda Morales International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ramon Villeda Morales International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Copan Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Copan Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
